mapper.sql: id, title, descr, file_url, lesson_id, adddate, editdate
mapper.insert: insert into courseware (id, title, descr, file_url, lesson_id, adddate, editdate) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{descr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lessonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{adddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{editdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

insert into courseware
id,
title,
descr,
file_url,
lesson_id,
adddate,
editdate,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

#{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

mapper.update:
update courseware
title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
descr = #{descr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
file_url = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
lesson_id = #{lessonId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
adddate = #{adddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
editdate = #{editdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update courseware set title = #{title,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, descr = #{descr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, file_url = #{fileUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, lesson_id = #{lessonId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, adddate = #{adddate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, editdate = #{editdate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select count(1) from courseware where 1=1
and lesson_id = #{lessonId}
